1.question:
The more you take, the more you leave behind.
What am I?

2.question: What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?

3.question: What comes once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years?

4.question: David's father has three sons : Snap, Crackle and...

5.question: What has many keys, but can't even open a single door?

6.question: What is black when you buy it, red when you use it, and gray when you throw it away?

7.question:
Tall I am young,
Short I am old,
While with life I glow,
Wind is my foe.
What am I?

8.question:
I am not alive, but I grow;
I don't have lungs, but I need air;
I don't have a mouth, but water kills me.
What am I?

9.question:
If you have me, you want to share me.
If you share me, you haven't got me.
What am I?

10.question:
What always runs but never walks,
Often murmurs, never talks,
Has a bed but never sleeps,
Has a mouth but never eats?

11.question:
I am a word of six;
My first three letters refer to an automobile;
My last three letters refer to a household animal;
My first four letters is a fish;
My whole is found in your room.
What am I?

12.question:
Which of the following statements is correct?
1. Only one of the statements is false
2. Exactly two of the statements are false.
3. Only three of the statements are false.
4. Exactly four of the statements are false.
5. All five of these statements are false.

13.question:
My age today is three times what it will be three years from now minus three times what my age was three years ago.
How old am I?

14.question: What can point in every direction but can't reach the destination by itself?

15.question: What goes up but never comes down?

16.question:
Always in you,
Sometimes on you,
If I surround you,
I can kill you.
What am I?

17.question:
I have lakes but no water,
No cars but I have streets,
Many places and borders,
But I'm in one piece.
What am I?

18.question:
I make two people out of one.
What am I?

19.question:
Until I am measured I am not known,
Yet how you miss me when I have flown.
What am I?

20.question:
Only one color, but not one size.
Stuck at the bottom, yet easily flies.
Present in sun, but not in rain.
Doing no harm, and feeling no pain.
What is it?
